pages.text: Spell Essences are concentrated magical extracts derived from magical flowers. They contain pure arcane energy tied to their source plant's elemental or magical affinity.$(br2)These essences are the primary components used in spellcasting and magical crafting.

Each essence can be used in three primary ways:$(br)1. Direct casting as a single-use spell$(br)2. Grafting onto a Living Staff for repeated casting$(br)3. As an ingredient in crafting magical items$(br2)All essences are consumed upon use when cast directly.
